pullrequest.title: Have wait monitor pulses not exceed acquisition device's capabilities

content.raw:
Ah, so the code for this was already in place, it's just that it assumed that the clock limit of the wait monitor was the relevant quantity, when it isn't (clock limit of the wait monitor output device doesn't have much to do with the pulses the acquisition device can measure).

So I've just changed that code instead.

Tested, and it compiles as expected.
